resources.string: "Choose the default keyboard that you'll use when writing emails, notes, and just about everywhere else. Note that you can install other third-party keyboards later."
" View the selected keyboard's Privacy Policy."
Adjust text size and layout for your Home screen, notification shade, dial pad, and more.
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your device.
Allow apps to access your location
Help improve MIUI by sending anonymous usage data (%s)
Give Mi Cloud, Phone, and other core features and services the permissions they require to work as designed

"Some of MIUI's core features and services won't be able to work as intended without these permissions (e.g. your device won't be able to display contact info during a call). If you disable these permissions, MIUI's apps will ask for individual permissions when they're required for a specific activity."
No network connection. View the Privacy Policy for this keyboard at %s.

"Your privacy is very important to us. Please read our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to understand what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices are available to you.
You must agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy before you can use MIUI."
You need to connect to the internet to activate Mi services and Find device.
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Terms of Service at %s."
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Privacy Policy at %s."
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, verify Mi Pay transactions, or to sign in to apps and services.
